alfredsnippet.snippet:
Plasma Spectroscopy, at https://books.google.com/books?id=w1CJHagviVsC&dq=plasma%2099%20universe%20date%3A2003-2007&source=gbs_book_other_versions

"Plasmas in nature should not be forgotten. It is sometimes said that more than 99 percent of the material in the universe is in the form of a plasma.  Just two examples are given Fig. 1.2.  The Earth is surrounded by several layers of ionosphere.  It starts at about 100 km above the Earth's surface and extends up to some 500 km.  Another example is the solar corona surrounding the Sun"
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Plasma is 99% of Observable Matter - Part 5
